title: Update fail
body: Already had patch but after my lcient crashed, it scans one file and fails at 33%...

replies.body: Yeah, it looks like there's a sudden burst of threads on this.  Specifically, it looks like a patch rolled out but some players are receiving an unspecified error at 33%.  I'll see if I can find more information, and will provide an update as soon as I can!
ITS AVG!!!! Uninstalled AVG and the game patches fine. Reinstalled AVG, patcher stuck at 33% again. FML.
I am having this same issue.
yo my account is really broken
We were able to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience!

Hello, I have spent the last week searching for any fix and nothing has worked, it stops at 33% scans about 3000 files then fails. I deleted AMD and know it will scan up to 6000 files then fails. Please help, I have nothing else to do/try at this point. 
Thank you :)

> [{quoted}](name=TargaryenRule,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kdqRmuL3,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-08T18:07:25.443+0000)
>
> Already had patch but after my lcient crashed, it scans one file and fails at 33%...

failure_description: ["Riot::LoLLauncherLib::UpdateWorker::DoUpdateGame: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/LoLPatcherLib\/UpdateWorker.cpp(451): Failed to install latest game client.","Riot::LoLLauncherLib::`anonymous-namespace'::InstallLatestSolutionRelease: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/LoLPatcherLib\/UpdateWorker.cpp(208): Failure or interruption while updating","Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateSolution: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/UpdateSolution.cpp(607): Failed to choose a target version","Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared::ChooseSolutionVersion: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Install\/UpdateAndInstallSolutionShared.cpp(268): Failed to enumerate available releases.","Riot::RADS::Patching::RemoteFileServerHTTP::EnumerateAvailableReleasesForRegion: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Networking\/ClientServer\/RemoteFileServerHTTP.cpp(118): Error retrieving release listing","Riot::RADS::Patching::RetrieveReleaseListing: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Patching\/Networking\/ClientServer\/RemoteFileServerCommon.cpp(46): Failed to download listing file from \"\/releases\/live\/solutions\/lol_game_client_sln\/releases\/releaselisting_NA\" to temp file \"C:\/Program Files (x86)\/League of Legends\/RADS\/temp\/TMP5.tmp\"","Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: C:\/jenkins\/workspace\/rads-code-win-release\/code\/Solutions\/RiotRADS\/Source\/RADS\/Common\/HTTPConnection.cpp(842): File not found, HTTP response code 504, while retrieving file:'\/releases\/live\/solutions\/lol_game_client_sln\/releases\/releaselisting_NA'."]

000180.698| ALWAYS| Queued Dradis event to be sent.
000180.710|   OKAY| DisplayError: title_error_update_failed.

Copy/pasting from the other thread:

Hey all,

We've noticed players reporting that they are getting a message that reads, "An Unspecified Error has Occurred." when downloading a patch today. We are currently investigating the issue and looking to resolve it. In the meantime, Pressing the "Retry" button seems to be allowing players to patch properly. I'll try to update [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/yc623nzp-patching-issue-on-na-10082016) when there's more information available.

**UPDATE**: Some players are reporting updating their Antivirus programs are allowing them to patch normally. 

**UPDATE#2**: The [Service Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) has been updated to reflect the issues on NA. Please check this page for the most up to date information.

I fixed mine by going to Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects then renaming \lol_game_client to \lol_game_client~ starting the patcher after it errored again I changed \lol_game_client back to normal and once I restarted patcher it said play. Idk if this is what fixed it but worth a try
Another option I just used and seems to work for now. Is add exclude Riot folder in ur Virus Protection
No updates just yet, but some players are getting through and patching now.  For the time being, I recommend continuing to select _retry_ to patch.
the patch "failed" the second time but allowed me to login anyways, not sure if thats new information for you or not.
Nevermind, went back and it got same error
Update ur Virus protection or whatever u have and it should work. It did mine. My windows defender needed updating for game to work

I had the same problem. I had the 6.20 patch already, then today when I started the cliend it was an update trying to install but it popped up the unespecified error. After that I restarted the cliend and it was at 33% with just one file scanning... After restarting it again and again suddenly it fixed itself, the Launch botton apeared and I could log in normally. (Srry for the bad english){{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

I am stuck a 33% I have tried running as admin still nothing...per the logs the server is returning a 504 error.

000031.847|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::TryGetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(769): Perform request failed: "Timeout was reached" (curl code 28), for file:'/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA'.
000061.899|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::TryGetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(769): Perform request failed: "Timeout was reached" (curl code 28), for file:'/releases/live/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/releases/releaselisting_NA'.

000073.335|  ERROR| Riot:
I turned off my firewall, updated my virus protection to the newest version and then restarted my computer.  the update instantly worked.  try that?
It looks like a new patch just rolled out.  Unless you're receiving any errors, it should update quickly.  Let me know if you run into any errors!

Thanks for the info!  What happens if you try Running As Administrator?

>
> Thanks for the info!  What happens if you try Running As Administrator?

I have the same problem. It is an unspecified error. Running as an admin does not help. It seems to be a problem with the update itself.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kdqRmuL3,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-10-08T18:33:24.516+0000)
>
> Thanks for the info!  What happens if you try Running As Administrator?

It's weird because even when I run it as administrator, it goes directly to 33% and says that only one file has been scanned. It then continues to scan for differences.
I get an Unspecified Error even if I run as administrator or repair, nothing fixes it so far.
I've tried as an administrator already for the third time now and it still isn't working??

same thing
Same issue here as well. I have friends dealing with the same issue too.
Tried running as administrator for a repair too and still having this issue.
Stuck at 33% Stuck at 33% and 1 file scanned. Then I get an error
Go riot go! Make those splash arts!!!!!!
Im back in now actually.
Same issue..Repaired it and fully reinstalled it, still getting the error.
